titleStmt.title: The mysteries of Mount Calvary opened and improved In a dialogue betwixt Christ and the soul. By J.V. rector of Woodston, in the county of Huntington.
titleStmt.author: J. V., rector of Woodston, in the county of Huntington.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed for Thomas Parkhurst, at the Bible and Three Crowns at the lower end of Cheapside near Mercers Chappel,
